cyclone.name: DANNY
cyclone.current_location: about 145 miles ESE of Beaufort, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest toward the southern South Carolina coast, then expected to move inland across SC and weaken
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: between Edisto Beach and South Santee River, South Carolina (near Charleston)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia and southern South Carolina coasts
weather_observation.wind: Brief periods of tropical-storm-force gusts (35–40 mph) possible late Monday afternoon through Monday night.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal inundation possible, generally less than 3 ft above ground level, mainly near high tide.
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain with locally higher amounts; urban and poor-drainage flooding possible.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and dangerous rip currents along the Georgia coast; brief tornado threat cannot be ruled out inland.
